#summary Designing a Passbook Pass

= Designing a Passbook Pass =

There are 5 easy keys steps to designing and creating a Passbook Pass.  With the [https://create.passkit.com PassKit Pass Designer] this is all made very easy via a GUI:

  # Decide the purpose of the Pass and select the Pass Type
  # Use the Pass Designer to choose your colours, and upload any images
  # Fill in the rest of the text information
  # Include any text or images to support other languages (if appropriate)
  # Choose whether the Pass should be public or private, unlimited or limited

Then save!

Onced saved in the Pass Designer you will be presented with a Pass link (and associated QR Code) that you you can easily distribute.

To see the Pass Designer in action check out [PassDesignerVideo this video]. It's less than 5 minutes but will give you a great feel for the simplistic process you can follow to quickly have great looking Passes.

Then [PassType click here] for documentation to help you select which is the best Pass Type.
